docs.lead_paragraph: FOCAL EXHIBIT: Without production there obviously would not be much distribution; and without distribution, consumption would be limited. The lesson of interdependence is plain, and this focal exhibit, in the Consumers Building, was designed by Egmont Arens to drive home that lesson.

headline.main: THE EXHIBITS: AN AMAZING ARRAY; Production and Distribution
